flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour, so the superhero will run 60 / 4 = <<60/4=15>>15 intervals of 10 miles in an hour.
Thus, the superhero can run 15 * 10 = <<15*10=105>>105 miles in an hour.
The superhero can run 105 - 100 = <<105-100=5>>5 miles farther than the supervillain can drive in an hour.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
